subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Since arriving in Lexington, Ky., for his minor league assignment, and generously refurbishing the home clubhouse with the help of a few electricians and personal shoppers, Roger Clemens has undergone his own subtle makeover.
snippet: Since arriving in Lexington, Ky., for his minor league assignment, and generously refurbishing the home clubhouse with the help of a few electricians and personal shoppers, Roger Clemens has undergone his own subtle makeover.
